1: Stand by me, O God, and speak in my favor against a sinful nation. Save me from the lying and sinful man.
2: For You are the God of my strength. Why have You turned away from me? Why do I have sorrow because those who hate me come against me with power?
3: Send out Your light and Your truth. Let them lead me. Let them bring me to Your holy hill and to the places where You live.
4: Then I will go to the altar of God, the God of my joy. And I will praise You with the harp, O God, my God.
5: Why are you sad, O my soul? Why have you become troubled within me? Hope in God, for I will praise Him again, my help and my God.
